Boston Rebellion Us Cup

Come out Check out the Boston Rebellion ProXCT Mountain Bike Race at Adams Farm this Weekend!.

Register Here. There is an event for Everyone. UCI Pro Men and Women MTB Racing is on Saturday as well as a 12K and 6K Trail Race (Running Race). Amateur MTB Racing and STXC will be on Sunday.
